meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unholy.
meanings.sent1: The unholiness of the abandoned church sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: The priest spoke about the unholiness of evil spirits during the sermon.
meanings.sent3: The unholiness of eating dessert before dinner made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The unholiness of the dark forest was palpable as we ventured deeper into its depths.
meanings.sent5: The unholiness of the haunted house made it impossible to ignore the eerie feeling.

meanings.sent1: The villagers feared the unholiness that lurked in the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: The painting depicted the battle between holiness and unholiness.
meanings.sent3: The unholiness of the mischievous cat knocking over the vase was undeniable.
meanings.sent4: The unholiness of the storm raging outside mirrored the turmoil within the protagonist.
meanings.sent5: The unholiness of the forbidden ritual was a dark shadow over the village.
